duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist and lead transitioning financial advisors from one financial firm to another.
Morning meetings with the new recruit team to review day's tasks and objectives.
Opening new client accounts and moving assets from contra firm to new firm.
Assisting the financial advisor's clients with new documents and questions in regards to moving their accounts.
Working with vendors to ensure correct and compliant completion of all tasks necessary to move over the advisors' book of business.
Ability to travel frequently for extended periods of time.
Able to work weekends and over 40 hours per week.
Aptitude for assisting and working cohesively with financial advisors and their assistants.
Leadership skills and ability to direct the firm and advisors with our transition system.
Communication skills, and capacity to maintain relationships with the new recruit team and supporting branch.
Management skills - hosting in-person/Zoom meetings with new recruit team and supporting branch.
Assisting with training new associates and clients on their new systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
